name: Add new timeBuzzer activities to a Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row
description: Every time a new activity is created in timeBuzzer, Make will automatically add it to a selected Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1X64lxXoItWeiMuZSt-T-LUeFMcKN5afPRFA0zMGb2Vc/edit?usp=sharing).
